title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table and displaying them in a dynamic text item or a data/text item, the formatting of the values is inconsistent.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item in a table. 2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and display them in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
